name: Roofing - Middle
data: What we're going to do since your roof is over seven years old, we can send someone out.
Right now, sir really quick, we have someone on the other line that can show you the different schedule window that you can choose from and this won't take long, okay?
Our expert roofing people will actually call you first before going there.
I believe your roof is more than 7 years old, right?
